snippet.title: Farland Story 2 (PC-98) (English) Part 1
snippet.description:
http://www.pandemoniumsoftworks.com

Part 1 of my playthrough of Farland Story 2  Arc no Ensei for the PC-98 in English.

This is the English translation made by BTAxis who translated the last Farland game I played.

 I was given the choice from the beginning of the game if i wanted to play the prologue and I chose Yes. I did so for 2 reasons. 
1. I thought that any items, gold, exp I got would carry on with my group....Wrong!!
2. This is supposed to be a continuation of Farland Story 1 and I don't really remember
the story so I wanted a refresher. Honestly I don't remember any of this..

Until Next Time!!
